data.question: What is the chemical formula of Zr-flu-SO2?
At what temperature were the X-ray intensity data for Er-hpt-MOF-1 measured?
What is the space group of Y-ken-MOF-1?
How does the presence of acetic acid affect the synthesis of Y-hpt-MOF-1?
data.answer: The presence of acetic acid is crucial in obtaining a high-quality crystalline material because using only 2-FBA afforded the formation of Y-hpt-MOF-1 with low crystallinity.

data.question: What is the role of the sulfone-functionalized H4MTBC-SO2 ligand in the synthesis of MOFs?
data.answer: The sulfone-functionalized H4MTBC-SO2 ligand is used as a novel desymmetrized building block towards the reticular synthesis of new Zr/Hf and RE MOFs, with enhanced gas sorption properties.

data.question: Is the structure of RE-ken-MOF-1 neutral?
Does the synthesis of Y-hpt-MOF-1 require the use of 2-fluorobenzoic acid as a modulator?
Is the BET surface area of Y-ken-MOF-1 higher than that of Y-ftw-MOF-2?
data.answer: Yes, the BET surface area of Y-ken-MOF-1 is 2621 m2 g-1, which is higher than that of Y-ftw-MOF-2 with 3690 m2 g-1.

data.question: What is the crystal system of Hf-flu-SO2?
What is the maximum CO2 uptake observed for Zr-flu-SO2 at 273 K and 1 bar?
What is the calculated density of Er-hpt-MOF-1?
Does the synthesis of Zr-flu-SO2 involve the use of benzoic acid as a modulator?
Is the BET surface area of Y-ken-MOF-1 the highest among all reported MOFs based on nonanuclear RE9-clusters?
data.answer: Yes, the BET surface area of Y-ken-MOF-1 is the highest among all reported MOFs based on nonanuclear RE9-clusters.

data.question: What is the formula weight of Ho-hpt-MOF-1?
What is the theta range for data collection for Y-ken-MOF-1?
Does the structure of Y-hpt-MOF-1 contain ordered 12-connected nonanuclear clusters?
Is the CO2 uptake of Y-hpt-MOF-1 at 273 K higher than that of Zr-flu-SO2 at the same conditions?
data.answer: Yes, the CO2 uptake of Y-hpt-MOF-1 at 273 K is higher than that of Zr-flu-SO2 at the same conditions.
